title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 301 - Administration Of Veteran Assistance And Federal Programs By Veteran Assistance Divisions Or Bureaus Of Social Services Departments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 301 - Administration Of Veteran Assistance And Federal Programs By Veteran Assistance Divisions Or Bureaus Of Social Services Departments

State Regulations
§ 301.1 - Administration of other social services programs by veteran assistance divisions
§ 301.2 - Definitions and conditions of eligibility for veteran assistance
§ 301.3 - Veterans and nonveterans in the same household; determination of initial and continuing responsibility
§ 301.4 - Care of war veterans and members of their families in public homes
§ 301.5 - Assistance to veterans

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 301

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§ 20, 34, 131[1], 169

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
